nodes.text: The Thrasybule sector was a sector located in the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy. It was bordered by the Gordian Reach, Belsmuth, Demetras, Rolion, and the Thesme sectors. Planets within Thrasybule included Syndaar.
During the Galactic Civil War, Thrasybule was governed by Moff Ghundrak.
